mapper.insert: insert into member_info(member_no, member_id, member_pwd, member_email, member_name, member_info_open, member_regidate, member_birth, member_gender, member_nickname, member_introduce, member_img) values( seq_member_no.nextval, #{member_id}, #{member_pwd}, #{member_email}, #{member_name}, #{member_info_open}, sysdate, #{member_birth}, #{member_gender}, #{member_nickname}, #{member_introduce}, #{member_img})
